instruction.value: DAY -1. Administer pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by IV route.
DAY -1. For 3 days, starting the evening of chemotherapy. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 2. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 0. Administer 30 minutes pre-transplant. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 0. Administer 60 minutes pre-transplant. May be administered by IV route.

DAY 1 of 21. If oral antiemetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 1 of 21. If oral anti-emetic has not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 1 of 7. If oral ondansetron has not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 60 minutes pre-PACLitaxel. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 1 of 7. May be administered by IV route.
DAYS 1, 2 & 3 of 21. If oral anti-emetics have not been taken by patient as instructed, administer 30 to 60 minutes pre-chemotherapy. May be administered by IV route.
DAYS 1, 2 & 3 of 21. May be administered by IV route.

DAY 1 of 21. If aprepitant was prescribed and not taken by patient as instructed, administer PRN nausea. May be administered by IV route.
DAY 1 of 21. for nausea. May be administered by IV route.

additionalnotes.value: Initiate order following completion of ondansetron 8 mg PO/IV Q8h x 3 days.
